attributes.action: Give our proud Lionesses a parade through London
attributes.background:
On Sunday 31 July 2022 our England Lionesses did our country proud.
As a mark of their achievement, we call upon the relevant bodies to grant them a ticker tape parade through the streets of London

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about approval for local events are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.
